posts.title: How this site come
posts.text: For MWWhen you are old and grey and full of sleep,And nodding by the fire, take down this book,And slowly read, and dream of the soft lookYour eyes had once, and of their shadows deep; How many loved your moments of glad grace,And loved your beauty with love false or true,But one man loved the pilgrim soul in you,And loved the sorrows of your changing face; And bending down beside the glowing bars,Murmur, a little sadly, how Love fledAnd paced upon the mountains overheadAnd hid his face amid a crowd of stars. Sign up Github just do it with your own email Generating an SSH key just do following the guide 123456ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "your_email@example.com" # just Entersudo apt-get install xclipxclip -sel clip < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pubssh -T git@github.comgit config --global user.name "xx"git config --global user.email "xx@xx" Initial your repo123456echo "# treelake.github.io" >> README.mdgit initgit add README.mdgit commit -m "first commit"git remote add origin git@github.com:treelake/treelake.github.io.gitgit push -u origin master Setup for hexo12345sudo apt-get install nodejssudo apt-get install npmsudo npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.orgsudo ln -s /usr/bin/nodejs /usr/bin/nodesudo npm install -g hexo-cli Initial your blog1234hexo init treelake.github.iogit clone https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus.git themes/icarusnpm install -S hexo-generator-json-contentnpm install hexo-deployer-git --save Theme-wiki ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus Hexo-Docs123$ hexo new "My New Post"$ hexo server$ hexo generate You Are The JavaScript In My HTML
